description:
In this self-paced career advancement course, you will learn how to take your career to the next level and place yourself well on your way towards a six figure plus salary while doing work you are passionate about. If you are a senior leader or professional who is feeling unfulfilled and dissatisfied with your career growth, then this course is for you.

Do you ever wonder why some people seem to have great opportunities fall into their laps while you work hard and do everything right but seem to make no headway? This course is guaranteed to help you get ahead and achieve the success you are looking for. Instructional videos and reflective exercises will help you reconnect you with your passions, guide you through an exploration of what is holding you back and provide you with proven strategies to overcome your personal pitfalls and unlock your potential. You will learn how to focus in on what excites you while learning about about growth industries so that you can take advantage of new opportunities.

With renewed energy and clarity of purpose this course will further equip you for success by showing you how to create time to make your goals realities. You have nothing to lose. What are you waiting for?
title: Reinvent Your Career - A Guide to a 6 Figure Income
